name: H.K. Rose
description: Complex, refreshing, and just delicately floral from a dash of rosewater and lavender-infused honey, this rosé-based cocktail is one of our favorites on Ardesia's cocktail list.
recipeIngredient: 1 ounce rouge vermouth, such as Dolin

recipeInstructions.text: For the lavender-infused honey: heat honey and lavender in a small saucepan over medium-high heat for about ten minutes. Let cool. Strain and funnel back into original container.
For the cocktail: fill a rocks glass with ice. Add rosé, vermouth, honey, and rosewater. Stir to combine. Garnish with lemon or lime curl and serve immediately.
